definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: There's always hope, but hope is tempered — often swamped — by hard facts.
sentences.chinese: 希望常常有，但它總是被鐵的事實動搖甚至磨滅。

sentences.english: Sometimes, the love between lovers will not separate die, but will become deeper.
sentences.chinese: 有時，戀人間的分離不會令愛磨滅，反而會變得更深。

sentences.english: The right to errancy is indelibly written into democracy.
sentences.chinese: 漂泊的權利難以磨滅地寫入了民主之中。

sentences.english: Summer slowly faded, and Grandpa died before it was time to bring in the harvest.
sentences.chinese: 夏曰逐步磨滅，爺爺在豐收前就棄世了。

sentences.english: Never was the impression made by His words and His look to be effaced .
sentences.chinese: 他的言語和神色給人的印象是永不磨滅的。

sentences.english: Clouds are the noble contributor for awesome photos.
sentences.chinese: 云爲攝影大片做出了不可磨滅的貢獻。

sentences.english: Mathematics can be said to be required to build on the achievements is indelible.
sentences.chinese: 可以說反證法爲數學所建立的功勳是不可磨滅的。

sentences.english: The memory of that day was indelibly printed on my brain.
sentences.chinese: 那天的記憶永不磨滅地印在我的腦海裏。

sentences.english: Transmigration it erase my love for you.
sentences.chinese: 輪迴它磨滅不了我對你的愛。

sentences.english: Tonight we will make a memory that will never be tarnished.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，我們就來製作一個永不磨滅的回想。

sentences.english: This innocence is brilliant. I hope that it will stay. -Avril Lavigne ?
sentences.chinese: 這份純真如此耀眼迷人，希望永不會磨滅。

sentences.english: If a person can sit in stillness for the briefest time, he creates merit and virtue which will never disappear.
sentences.chinese: 若能靜坐片刻的時間，就有永不磨滅的功德。

sentences.english: My memories here will never fade.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏的記憶將永不磨滅。

sentences.english: Indelible history, can not forget national humiliation.
sentences.chinese: 歷史不可磨滅，國恥不能忘卻。

sentences.english: During his prime, when he fought, he always left an indelible imprint.
sentences.chinese: 在巔峯狀態，泰森的比賽總是留下難以磨滅的印記。

sentences.english: Even we die in the war, our heart and mind will go on.
sentences.chinese: 即使戰死沙場，我們的心與精神永不磨滅。

definition: to erase/to cover traces/to obliterate evidence/to expunge/to blot out/to suppress
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
to engulf/to bury/to overlook/to stifle/to neglect/to fall into oblivion
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
to cut off/to chop sth in half
